com.opengamma.strata.pricer.rate

Interface RateObservationFn<T extends RateObservation>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of rate to be observed

    public interface RateObservationFn<T extends RateObservation>
    Observes a rate from an index.

    This function provides the ability to observe a rate defined by RateObservation. The rate will be based on known historic data and forward curves.

    Implementations must be immutable and thread-safe functions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        static RateObservationFn<RateObservation> instance()
        Returns a default instance of the function.

        Use this method to avoid a direct dependency on the implementation.

        Returns:
        the rate observation function

      • rate

        double rate(T observation,
            LocalDate startDate,
            LocalDate endDate,
            RatesProvider provider)
        Determines the applicable rate for the observation.

        Each type of rate has specific rules, encapsulated in RateObservation.

        The start date and end date refer to the accrual period. In many cases, this information is not necessary, however it does enable some implementations that would not otherwise be possible.

        Parameters:
        observation - the rate to be observed
        startDate - the start date of the accrual period
        endDate - the end date of the accrual period
        provider - the rates provider
        Returns:
        the applicable rate

      • rateSensitivity

        PointSensitivityBuilder rateSensitivity(T observation,
                                        LocalDate startDate,
                                        LocalDate endDate,
                                        RatesProvider provider)
        Determines the point sensitivity for the rate observation.

        This returns a sensitivity instance referring to the curves used to determine each forward rate.

        Parameters:
        observation - the rate that the sensitivity is for
        startDate - the start date of the accrual period
        endDate - the end date of the accrual period
        provider - the rates provider
        Returns:
        the point sensitivity

      • explainRate

        double explainRate(T observation,
                   LocalDate startDate,
                   LocalDate endDate,
                   RatesProvider provider,
                   ExplainMapBuilder builder)
        Explains the calculation of the applicable rate.

        This adds information to the ExplainMapBuilder to aid understanding of the observation. The actual rate is also returned.

        Parameters:
        observation - the rate to be observed
        startDate - the start date of the accrual period
        endDate - the end date of the accrual period
        provider - the rates provider
        builder - the builder to populate
        Returns:
        the applicable rate
